DOC.brief_summary: Human embryos preserve later transfer freeze . Traditionally slow cooling method use . About 70 % embryo remain fully intact thaw . However , remain 30 % embryo become ( partially ) damage , freeze damage reduces chance implant . Recently ultra rapid freeze method , call vitrification develop . During vitrification damage ice crystal form embryo freezes glass like state . It appear freezing damage reduce embryos vitrify . Observational study human indicate embryo successfully preserve vitrification , indicate promising pregnancy rate follow thawing . However , effectiveness vitrification relation slow cool respect pregnancy rate far evaluate randomised , controlled trial . The aim study investigate whether vitrification significantly improve embryo survival ongoing pregnancy rate compare embryos frozen slow cooling .
DOC.brief_title: Vitrification Versus Slow Cooling Human Cleavage Stage Embryos
